effect.diamond_pearl: User’s type changes to the type of one of its moves, selected at random. hidden power and weather ball are treated as normal. Only moves with a different type are eligible, and curse is never eligible. If the user has no suitable moves, this move will fail.
effect.platinum: User’s type changes to the type of one of its moves, selected at random. hidden power and weather ball are treated as normal. Only moves with a different type are eligible, and curse is never eligible. If the user has no suitable moves, this move will fail.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: User’s type changes to the type of one of its moves, selected at random. hidden power and weather ball are treated as normal. Only moves with a different type are eligible, and curse is never eligible. If the user has no suitable moves, this move will fail.

short_effect.diamond_pearl: User’s type changes to the type of one of its moves at random.
short_effect.platinum: User’s type changes to the type of one of its moves at random.
short_effect.heartgold_soulsilver: User’s type changes to the type of one of its moves at random.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user changes its type to become the same type as one of its moves.
flavor_text.platinum: The user changes its type to become the same type as one of its moves.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user changes its type to become the same type as one of its moves.
